tree-c-node-0.name: Nimble Climber
tree-c-node-0.description: You can climb and vault more quickly.

tree-b-node-0.name: Used To The Weight
tree-b-node-0.description: Wearing a shield doesn't slow you down as much.

tree-d-node-0.name: Agile Croucher
tree-d-node-0.description: Your movement speed while crouching is increased.

tree-b-node-1-1.name: Blast-Born
tree-b-node-1-1.description: Your hearing is less affected by nearby explosions.

tree-b-node-1-2.name: Fight Or Flight
tree-b-node-1-2.description: When you're hurt in combat, regain a fixed amount of stamina. Has cooldown between uses.

tree-b-node-1-3.name: Survivor's Stamina
tree-b-node-1-3.description: When you're critically hurt, your stamina regenerates faster.

tree-b-node-1-4.name: Downed But Determined
tree-b-node-1-4.description: When you're downed, it takes longer before you collapse.

tree-b-node-1-5.name: Turtle Crawl
tree-b-node-1-5.description: While downed, you take less damage.

tree-b-node-1-6-3-3.name: Back On Your Feet
tree-b-node-1-6-3-3.description: When you're critically hurt, your health regenerates until a certain limit.

tree-b-node-2-1.name: Gentle Pressure
tree-b-node-2-1.description: You make less noise when breaching.

tree-b-node-2-2.name: Proficient Pryer
tree-b-node-2-2.description: Breaching doors and containers takes less time.

tree-b-node-2-3.name: Unburdened Roll
tree-b-node-2-3.description: If your shield breaks, your first Dodge Roll within a few seconds does not cost stamina.

tree-b-node-3-2.name: Loaded Arms
tree-b-node-3-2.description: Your equipped weapon has less impact on your encumbrance.

tree-b-node-2-5.name: Sky-Clearing Swing
tree-b-node-2-5.description: You deal more melee damage to drones.

tree-b-node-2-6-3-3.name: Flyswatter
tree-b-node-2-6-3-3.description: Wasps and Turrets can now be destroyed with a single melee attack.

tree-c-node-1-3.name: Carry The Momentum
tree-c-node-1-3.description: After a Sprint Dodge Roll, sprinting does not consume stamina for a short time. Has a cooldown between uses.

tree-c-node-2-3.name: Calming Stroll
tree-c-node-2-3.description: While walking, your stamina regenerates as if you were standing still.

tree-c-node-2-1.name: Slip and Slide
tree-c-node-2-1.description: You can slide further and faster.

tree-c-node-2-2.name: Sturdy Ankles
tree-c-node-2-2.description: You take less fall damage when falling from a non-lethal height.

tree-c-node-1-5.name: Heroic Leap
tree-c-node-1-5.description: You can Sprint Dodge Roll Further.

tree-c-node-3-1.name: Crawl Before You Walk
tree-c-node-3-1.description: When you're downed, you crawl faster.

tree-c-node-3-2.name: Vigorous Vaulter
tree-c-node-3-2.description: Vaulting is no longer slowed down while exhausted.

tree-c-node-2-5.name: Ready To Roll
tree-c-node-2-5.description: When falling, your timing window to perform a Recovery Roll is increased.

tree-c-node-2-6-3-3.name: Vault Spring
tree-c-node-2-6-3-3.description: Lets you jump at the end of a vault.

tree-d-node-1-1.name: Revitalizing Squat
tree-d-node-1-1.description: Stamina regeneration while crouched is increased.

tree-d-node-1-2.name: In-round Crafting
tree-d-node-1-2.description: Unlocks the ability to field-craft items while topside.

tree-d-node-1-3.name: Good As New
tree-d-node-1-3.description: While under a healing effect, stamina regeneration is increased.

tree-d-node-2-1.name: Looter's Instincts
tree-d-node-2-1.description: When searching a container, loot is revealed faster.

tree-d-node-2-2.name: Silent Scavenger
tree-d-node-2-2.description: You make less noise when looting.

tree-d-node-2-3.name: Suffer In Silence
tree-d-node-2-3.description: While critically hurt, your movement makes less noise.

tree-d-node-2-4.name: Broad Shoulders
tree-d-node-2-4.description: Increases the maximum weight you can carry.

tree-d-node-1-4.name: Stubborn Mule
tree-d-node-1-4.description: Your stamina regeneration is less affected by being over-encumbered.

tree-d-node-1-5.name: Three Deep Breaths
tree-d-node-1-5.description: After an ability drains your stamina, you recover more quickly.

tree-d-node-2-5.name: Looter's Luck
tree-d-node-2-5.description: While looting, there's a chance to reveal twice as many items at once.

tree-d-node-3-1.name: Traveling Tinkerer
tree-d-node-3-1.description: Unlocks additional items to field craft.

tree-d-node-3-2.name: One Raider's Scraps
tree-d-node-3-2.description: When looting Raider containers, you have a small chance of finding additional field-crafted items.

tree-d-node-1-6-3-3.name: Minesweeper
tree-d-node-1-6-3-3.description: Mines and explosive deployables can be defused when in close proximity.

tree-a-node-1-6-3-3.name: Branch 1 & 3 Convergence
tree-a-node-1-6-3-3.description: Master node where branches 1 and 3 meet - unlocked by completing branch 1 OR branch 3

tree-a-node-2-6-3-3.name: Branch 2 & 3 Convergence
tree-a-node-2-6-3-3.description: Master node where branches 2 and 3 meet - unlocked by completing branch 2 OR branch 3

tree-a-node-0.name: Core Skill A
tree-a-node-0.description: The foundation skill of Tree A. Start your journey here.
